definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Set this option to show the file size below the image thumbnail.
sentences.chinese: 设定此选项以在图像缩略图下方显示文件大小。

sentences.english: Their filesize limit is 100MB and each file can be downloaded unlimited times.
sentences.chinese: 文件大小限100M，无限时下载。

sentences.english: Contains a large file-sized flat storage pocket.
sentences.chinese: 包含一个大文件大小的平坦的储物袋。

sentences.english: Note that the file sizes increase in this same direction.
sentences.chinese: 注意文件大小同向增加。

sentences.english: How do larger mail file sizes affect system resources?
sentences.chinese: 邮件文件大小增加如何影响系统资源？

sentences.english: Another file size-based optimization is delayed allocation.
sentences.chinese: 另一个基于文件大小的优化是延迟分配。

sentences.english: Verify that the file sizes are correct.
sentences.chinese: 验证文件大小是否正确。

sentences.english: The format of the submissions is planned to reduce file sizes.
sentences.chinese: 提交物的格式按照减小文件大小的需要来。

sentences.english: They share a common file size of 2,658,304 bytes.
sentences.chinese: 他们都有一个共同文件大小2658304字节。

definition: to save (a file) after options (name, location, format etc) have been selected by the user
(computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
Save As ... (menu option in a software application)
